html:
April 29 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:: *AIRTEL AFRICA - OLUSEGUN "SEGUN" OGUNSANYA, MANAGING DIRECTOR AND CEO NIGERIA IS TO SUCCEED RAGHUNATH "RAGHU" MANDAVA, AS MANAGING DIRECTOR AND CEO *AIRTEL AFRICA - RAGHU MANDAVA'S INFORMED BOARD OF HIS INTENTION TO RETIRE *AIRTEL AFRICA - OGUNSANYA WILL JOIN BOARD OF AIRTEL AFRICA PLC WITH EFFECT FROM 1 OCTOBER 2021.


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 29-APR-202106:00:11 GMT
